data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Nordrhein-Westfalen that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 10,576,516 people in the state of Nordrhein-Westfalen who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 372,501 believers in the state of Nordrhein-Westfalen to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany to the gospel today.
Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, convict the 372,501 believers in Nordrhein-Westfalen to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nordrhein-Westfalen, Germany has a population of 17,872,800.

We estimate Nordrhein-Westfalen has 372,501 people who might know Jesus, 10,576,516 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,923,783 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Nordrhein-Westfalen.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
